    pub fn short_summary(&self) -> String
}

impl SourceFile {

    pub fn new(path: String, content: String) -> Self
    // A public method to access a derived property.

    pub fn line_count(&self) -> u32
    // Internal method for processing
    // Private validation method
}

impl Summarizable for SourceFile {
}
// Additional trait for file operations

pub trait FileOperations {
    type Error;

    pub fn read_content(&self) -> Result<&str, Self::Error>

    pub fn write_content(&mut self, content: String) -> Result<(), Self::Error>
}
// Error type for file operations

pub enum FileError {
    NotFound,
    PermissionDenied,
    InvalidContent,
}

impl FileOperations for SourceFile {
}
